title: MacOs Mojave v10.14.1 Boot Image/ Bootable USB image
description:
MacOs Mojave v10.14.1 Boot Image.

I had used it to clean-install MacOs on my Macbook. Can be used for recovery purpose too.

----
Contents: Install MacOs Mojave.7z
Filesize: 5.97 GB
----

Note: 

a. Backup the contents of your disk/install location before attempting the clean install.

b. The compressed file contains the installer as well as some hidden system files created by the Disk Utility when creating the boot-image.

---


Instructions:

1. Extract the 7z file directly in the USB root folder(the first folder that is displayed when you click to open the USB drive on your system).


2. Reboot your Mac, and hold the Option Key when the Mac restarts. It should display the Recovery screen.

3. Format and then rename the partition where you want to install the OS. For a clean install, this would be the existing partition on which the OS is currently installed. If you are dual booting or installing for Hackintosh purposes, please find an appropriate guide on the internet.

4. Proceed to installation
